parameters: The Memory Space is truly chaotic.
You can never trust the road you walk on.
Perhaps it is because of the richness
of Tahati's memory, or because of the
other memories mixing in as well...
This well looks like there's something
so we can't go down any further.
No, no, no. That ice isn't normal!
What do you mean by that?
Back in the past when I was teaching
magic to my disciple, this "eternal ice"
was created during that lesson, and...
You really did do such incredible things
Well, even if I said eternal,
And we just happened to be unlucky
said ice got stuck in the well, then?
No matter how strong it is, it's
not like it won't break after some point, no?
Yeah, even if we can't do it...
However... this is a replayed memory.
Everything here is in its ideal state.
So this ice really is eternal...
If I can remember my intentions in
You said you taught magic in the past.
Perhaps it is because of the advances
Even Miss Tahati was unable to create
Perhaps you wanted to say that such
a thing could not have existed?
I feel like we're getting a little closer...
But did Tahati really want to create
I mean, the real thing's right here.
Rather, the ice here may be the memories
I was just listing out my thoughts...
To be precise, my memory of witnessing
Your disciple wished to create eternal ice,
so you created this as an example.
And then I completely demolished it
with a single cast of Fire.
What the hell were you thinking...
It was a lesson about attributes.
No matter how strong the magic is,
as long as it is still Ice attribute,
Now then, let us melt away this ice.
However, no half-baked fire can do.
It has to be something powerful.
Speaking of a strong Fire attribute...
...I have a feeling she won't come
even if we reached out to her.
So I just havta melt the ice?
A well in such a place, hm.
We can go down now with Kann's help.

events.name: エネミーシンボル：ランダム
